column2: This  is  a  revision  application  from  the  order  of the  learned  District Judge  made  in
Case  No.  D.e.  Colombo 15270/L refusing an  application  by the Plaintiff to re-execute

column1: the writ on the judgment entered in this case.

column2: The  dispute between the Plaintiff and  the Defendant is  over a right of way, depicted
as  Lot  5  in  Plan  No.364 filed  in  a previous  partition  action  bearing No.1085/P in  the
District Court of Colombo. The  plaintiff's land  is  situated on the northern side of this

column1: right of way and the defendant's land is on the southern side.

column2: The  plaintiff's contention  is  that he  and  his  predecessors  in  title had  been  using this
